## createDefaultClipPlanesEvaluator variable

Factory function that creates default \[\[ClipPlanesEvaluator\]\] that calculates near plane based on ground distance and camera orientation.

Creates \[\[TiltViewClipPlanesEvaluator\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createDefaultClipPlanesEvaluator: () => TiltViewClipPlanesEvaluator
```
